queries.question: What is the area of Thailand?
queries.ddl:
CREATE TABLE "MONDIAL_GPT"."MONDIAL_COUNTRY" 
   (	"NAME" VARCHAR2(50 BYTE), 
	"CODE" VARCHAR2(4 BYTE), 
	"CAPITAL" VARCHAR2(50 BYTE), 
	"PROVINCE" VARCHAR2(50 BYTE), 
	"AREA" NUMBER, 
	"POPULATION" NUMBER, 
	"META_REPCOL" VARCHAR2(4000 BYTE)
   ) SEGMENT CREATION IMMEDIATE 
  PCTFREE 10 PCTUSED 40 INITRANS 1 MAXTRANS 255 
 NOCOMPRESS LOGGING
  STORAGE(INITIAL 65536 NEXT 1048576 MINEXTENTS 1 MAXEXTENTS 2147483645
  PCTINCREASE 0 FREELISTS 1 FREELIST GROUPS 1
  BUFFER_POOL DEFAULT FLASH_CACHE DEFAULT CELL_FLASH_CACHE DEFAULT)
  TABLESPACE "MONDIAL_GPT" ;
queries.ddl_postgres:
CREATE TABLE "MONDIAL_GPT"."MONDIAL_COUNTRY" 
   ("NAME" VARCHAR(50), 
	"CODE" VARCHAR(4),

queries.sql_coder:
SELECT MONDIAL_COUNTRY.AREA
FROM MONDIAL_COUNTRY
WHERE MONDIAL_COUNTRY.NAME ilike '%Thailand%'

FROM MONDIAL_COUNTRY

    name VARCHAR(50),
    code VARCHAR(4),
    capital VARCHAR(50),
    province VARCHAR(50),
    area NUMERIC,
    population NUMERIC,
    meta_repcol VARCHAR(4000)
);

(

queries.sql_coder:
SELECT name
FROM mondial_gpt.mondial_country
WHERE independence BETWEEN '1910-08-01' AND '1950-08-01'
ORDER BY name NULLS LAST;

SELECT name
FROM mondial_gpt.mondial_country
WHERE independence BETWEEN TO_DATE('1910-08-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('1950-08-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY name NULLS LAST;

queries.sql_coder_oracle: SELECT MONDIAL_COUNTRY.name, SUM(MONDIAL_COUNTRY.population) AS total_population FROM MONDIAL_COUNTRY JOIN MONDIAL_GEO_SEA ON MONDIAL_COUNTRY.code = MONDIAL_GEO_SEA.country WHERE MONDIAL_GEO_SEA.sea = 'Caribbean Sea' GROUP BY MONDIAL_COUNTRY.name ORDER BY total_population DESC NULLS LAST;

queries.sql_coder:
SELECT MONDIAL_COUNTRY.name,
       COUNT(DISTINCT MONDIAL_BORDERS.country2) AS neighbor_count
FROM MONDIAL_COUNTRY
JOIN MONDIAL_BORDERS ON MONDIAL_COUNTRY.code = MONDIAL_BORDERS.country1
WHERE MONDIAL_COUNTRY.continent = 'Africa'
GROUP BY MONDIAL_COUNTRY.name
ORDER BY neighbor_count DESC NULLS LAST;
queries.sql_coder_oracle:
SELECT MONDIAL_COUNTRY.name, 
       COUNT(DISTINCT MONDIAL_BORDERS.country2) AS neighbor_count 
FROM MONDIAL_COUNTRY 
JOIN MONDIAL_BORDERS ON MONDIAL_COUNTRY.code = MONDIAL_BORDERS.country1 
WHERE MONDIAL_COUNTRY.continent = 'Africa' 
GROUP BY MONDIAL_COUNTRY.name 
ORDER BY CASE WHEN neighbor_count IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END, neighbor_count DESC;

queries.sql_coder:
SELECT MONDIAL_GPT.MONDIAL_CONTINENT.name,
       AVG(MONDIAL_GPT.MONDIAL_POPULATION.infant_mortality) AS average_infant_mortality
FROM MONDIAL_GPT.MONDIAL_CONTINENT
JOIN MONDIAL_GPT.MONDIAL_ENCOMPASSES ON MONDIAL_GPT.MONDIAL_CONTINENT.name = MONDIAL_GPT.MONDIAL_ENCOMPASSES.continent
JOIN MONDIAL_GPT.MONDIAL_POPULATION ON MONDIAL_GPT.MONDIAL_ENCOMPASSES.country = MONDIAL_GPT.MONDIAL_POPULATION.country
GROUP BY MONDIAL_GPT.MONDIAL_CONTINENT.name
ORDER BY average_infant_mortality DESC NULLS LAST;
queries.sql_coder_oracle:
SELECT MONDIAL_GPT.MONDIAL_CONTINENT.name,
       AVG(MONDIAL_GPT.MONDIAL_POPULATION.infant_mortality) AS average_infant_mortality
FROM MONDIAL_GPT.MONDIAL_CONTINENT
JOIN MONDIAL_GPT.MONDIAL_ENCOMPASSES ON MONDIAL_GPT.MONDIAL_CONTINENT.name = MONDIAL_GPT.MONDIAL_ENCOMPASSES.continent
JOIN MONDIAL_GPT.MONDIAL_POPULATION ON MONDIAL_GPT.MONDIAL_ENCOMPASSES.country = MONDIAL_GPT.MONDIAL_POPULATION.country
GROUP BY MONDIAL_GPT.MONDIAL_CONTINENT.name
ORDER BY AVG(MONDIAL_GPT.MONDIAL_POPULATION.infant_mortality) DESC NULLS LAST;

queries.sql_coder:
SELECT MONDIAL_ORGANIZATION.NAME
FROM MONDIAL_ORGANIZATION
JOIN MONDIAL_ISMEMBER ON MONDIAL_ORGANIZATION.ORGANIZATION = MONDIAL_ISMEMBER.ORGANIZATION
JOIN MONDIAL_COUNTRY ON MONDIAL_ISMEMBER.COUNTRY = MONDIAL_COUNTRY.CODE
WHERE MONDIAL_COUNTRY.AREA > 10000
  AND MONDIAL_COUNTRY.POPULATION < 3000
  AND MONDIAL_ISMEMBER.TYPE ='member'
ORDER BY MONDIAL_ORGANIZATION.NAME NULLS LAST;
queries.sql_coder_oracle:
SELECT MONDIAL_ORGANIZATION.NAME
FROM MONDIAL_ORGANIZATION
JOIN MONDIAL_ISMEMBER ON MONDIAL_ORGANIZATION.ORGANIZATION = MONDIAL_ISMEMBER.ORGANIZATION
JOIN MONDIAL_COUNTRY ON MONDIAL_ISMEMBER.COUNTRY = MONDIAL_COUNTRY.CODE
WHERE MONDIAL_COUNTRY.AREA > 10000
  AND MONDIAL_COUNTRY.POPULATION < 3000
  AND MONDIAL_ISMEMBER.TYPE ='member'
ORDER BY NULLIF(MONDIAL_ORGANIZATION.NAME, MONDIAL_ORGANIZATION.NAME) DESC, MONDIAL_ORGANIZATION.NAME;

ORDER BY MONDIAL_GPT.MONDIAL_CONTINENT.AREA DESC NULLS LAST

WHERE MONDIAL_LANGUAGE.NAME = 'French'
GROUP BY MONDIAL_COUNTRY.NAME;

       AVG(MONDIAL_CITY.elevation) AS average_elevation,
       SUM(MONDIAL_CITY.population) AS total_population

WHERE LOWER(MONDIAL_COUNTRY.name) LIKE '%thailand%'
GROUP BY MONDIAL_COUNTRY.name;
